SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class UpdateInformation

Object
UpdateInformation
public class UpdateInformation extends Object
The UpdateInformation class provides functionality for updating user information, including phone numbers and email addresses. It ensures validation of the provided data before saving changes.

  • Method Details

    • updateInformation

      public void updateInformation(String userId) throws IOException
      Updates the phone number or email address of a specific user. Prompts the user to select an option and validates the input before applying changes.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose information is to be updated.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving user data.

    • getValidatedOption

      private int getValidatedOption(Scanner sc)
      Validates and retrieves the user's menu selection as an integer.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner instance for user input.
      Returns:
      the validated menu option as an integer.

    • updatePhoneNumber

      private void updatePhoneNumber(Scanner sc, User user, ValidatePhoneNo validatePhoneNo) throws IOException
      Updates the phone number of the specified user. Validates the phone number using ValidatePhoneNo.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner instance for user input.
      user - the User object whose phone number is being updated.
      validatePhoneNo - the ValidatePhoneNo instance for validation.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving user data.

    • updateEmail

      private void updateEmail(Scanner sc, User user, ValidateEmail validateEmail) throws IOException
      Updates the email address of the specified user. Validates the email address using ValidateEmail.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner instance for user input.
      user - the User object whose email address is being updated.
      validateEmail - the ValidateEmail instance for validation.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving user data.
